items.name: Avocado Eggrolls
items.description: Avocado, Sun-Dried Tomato, Red Onion and Cilantro Fried in a Crisp Wrapper. Served with a Tamarind-Cashew Dipping Sauce.

items.name: Buffalo Blasts
items.description: Chicken, Cheese and Our Spicy Buffalo Sauce all Stuffed in a Spiced Wrapper and Fried until Crisp. Served with Celery Sticks and Blue Cheese Dressing.

items.name: Fried Macaroni and Cheese

items.name: Factory Burger

items.name: Eggplant Parmesan
items.description: Panko Crusted Eggplant Served Over Spaghetti with Marinara Sauce and Mozzarella.

items.name: Chicken Madeira
items.description: Sauteed Chicken Breast Topped with Fresh Asparagus and Melted Mozzarella Cheese. Covered with Fresh Mushroom Madeira Sauce and Served with Mashed Potatoes.

items.name: Original Cheesecake
items.description: The one that started it all! Our famous creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust and sour cream topping.
